claim: In the duel format, the ten cards with the highest mana cost are Astral Cornucopia, Entreat the Angels, Quarantine Field, Mass Manipulation, Hour of Eternity, Recall, Part Water, Fall of the Titans, Bonfire of the Damned, and Release the Gremlins.
extra_info: duels refer to format = 'duel'; the highest uncoverted mana cost refers to MAX(manaCost)
reasoning: The claim lists exactly 10 cards as having the highest manaCost in duel format. The top 7 cards are correct (Astral Cornucopia, Entreat the Angels, Quarantine Field, Mass Manipulation, Hour of Eternity, Recall, Part Water). However, at the {X}{X}{R} mana cost tier, there are 6 cards tied (Bonfire of the Damned, Builder's Bane, Conflagrate, Fall of the Titans, Meteor Shower, Release the Gremlins), not just the 3 the claim lists. The claim omits Meteor Shower, Builder's Bane, and Conflagrate, which share the same mana cost as the three {X}{X}{R} cards included in the claim.

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,
    colorIndicator          TEXT,
    colors                  TEXT,
    convertedManaCost       REAL,
    duelDeck                TEXT,
    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,
    uuid   TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT c.name, c.manaCost FROM cards c JOIN legalities l ON c.uuid = l.uuid WHERE l.format = 'duel' ORDER BY LENGTH(c.manaCost) DESC, c.manaCost DESC LIMIT 20;"
input.description: Get cards in duel format with highest manaCost (by string length as proxy)

content.thinking:
The hint says "the highest unconverted mana cost refers to MAX(manaCost)". The manaCost is a text field with values like `{X}{X}{X}`. The claim is about the "highest mana cost" not "highest converted mana cost". Let me think about what MAX(manaCost) would return for text fields - it would be lexicographic ordering.

Let me look at what `manaCost` values look like for the cards mentioned in the claim, and also sort by MAX(manaCost) properly.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT c.name, c.manaCost FROM cards c JOIN legalities l ON c.uuid = l.uuid WHERE l.format = 'duel' AND c.manaCost IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.manaCost DESC LIMIT 20;"
input.description: Get top 20 cards by manaCost descending (lexicographic)

content.text: The results show ties at the `{X}{X}{R}` level. Let me verify this more carefully.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT DISTINCT c.name, c.manaCost FROM cards c JOIN legalities l ON c.uuid = l.uuid WHERE l.format = 'duel' AND c.manaCost = '{X}{X}{R}' ORDER BY c.name;"
input.description: Get all duel-format cards with manaCost = {X}{X}{R}

content.text:
There are 6 cards with `{X}{X}{R}` mana cost in duel format, not just the 3 listed in the claim. The claim says the top 10 include "Fall of the Titans, Bonfire of the Damned, and Release the Gremlins" but omits **Meteor Shower, Builder's Bane, and Conflagrate**, which have the same mana cost.

The first 7 positions (Astral Cornucopia through Part Water/Recall) are correct, but at the `{X}{X}{R}` tier there are 6 cards, making it impossible to select exactly 10 without arbitrarily excluding 3 of the tied cards. The claim cherry-picks 3 of 6 tied cards, omitting the other 3.
